https://tmrev.io/movie/258235-Bit by Bit 2022-11-27
https://image.tmdb.org/t/p/w500/oZOuEPRszkiwBNEVbf0wrRq3Obi.jpg Six people, one room, one night, one game, a lot of sensuality and much to discover. A Film that shows how bodies and minds might meet when allowed to. Get involved within a stimulating experiment, somewhere between aesthetic statement and real venture, between pornographic art and the attempt to reposition sexuality within dialogue and actions. Bit by Bit
